thread.title: 76-year-old man hangs himself in Bronx hospital
thread.title_full: 76-year-old man hangs himself in Bronx hospital

author: ROCCO PARASCANDOLA, GRAHAM RAYMAN
title: 76-year-old man hangs himself in Bronx hospital
text:
Patient at Bronx's Montefiore Medical Center hangs himself with belt Patient at Bronx hospital hangs himself with belt Officials say a 76-year-old man hung himself with a belt at Montefiore Medical Center in the Bronx early Tuesday. (Christie M Farriella/for New York Daily News) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Tuesday, March 28, 2017, 8:26 AM 
A 76-year-old man hung himself with a belt at Montefiore Medical Center in the Bronx early Tuesday, officials said. 
The man, who was not immediately identified, took his life in the bathroom of his room in the hospital on E. 210th St. near Bainbridge Ave. in Norwood, police said. He died at about 4:30 a.m. 
He was an admitted patient, not in police custody, officials said.
